bibl.title: "Graeco-Roman Egypt": Fact or Fiction?
Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Lewis, Naphtali

bibl.note: Questions the validity of the communis opinio on the continuity of Ptolemaic Egypt in Roman times.
Lewis Naphtali, "Graeco-Roman Egypt": Fact or Fiction?
Proceedings of the Twelfth International Congress of Papyrology (Toronto, 1970) pp. 3-14.
